scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to the OpenAI API.

OPENAI_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for all OpenAI API requests.

OPENAI_SMALL_MODEL.description: Identifier of the small language model to be used (overrides SMALL_MODEL).

SMALL_MODEL.description: Fallback identifier for the small language model if OPENAI_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

OPENAI_LARGE_MODEL.description: Identifier of the large language model to be used (overrides LARGE_MODEL).

LARGE_MODEL.description: Fallback identifier for the large language model if OPENAI_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model to use for generating text embeddings.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_URL.description: Custom base URL for the OpenAI embeddings endpoint.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_API_KEY.description: Custom API key for the OpenAI embeddings endpoint.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for the returned embedding vectors.

OPENAI_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for describing images.

OPENAI_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_MAX_TOKENS.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed in the image-description model response.

OPENAI_TTS_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for text-to-speech generation.

OPENAI_TTS_VOICE.description: Voice profile to use for text-to-speech output.

OPENAI_TTS_INSTRUCTIONS.description: Optional instructions to control the style or behavior of the text-to-speech request.

OPENAI_EXPERIMENTAL_TELEMETRY.description: Enable experimental telemetry features for enhanced debugging and usage analytics.

OPENAI_BROWSER_BASE_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for OpenAI requests (no secrets in the client).

OPENAI_BROWSER_EMBEDDING_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for OpenAI embeddings.
